original_title: Royal Warriors & Yes, Madam! Location Video
overview: Mike Leeder and Arne Venema visit the shooting locations seen in Yes, Madam! (1985) and Royal Warriors (1986), showing how they have changed in the intervening years. Included as a bonus feature on Eureka's 2023 Blu-ray release of Royal Warriors.
title: Royal Warriors & Yes, Madam! Location Video
